credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Horace W. Frost
title: Rustam on Horseback, Dragging a Warrior with his Lasso (from a "Shahnama" of Firdawsi)
medium: opaque watercolor on paper, heightened with gold
inscriptions: center in black ink: [calligraphic inscription]; verso in ink: [four columns of calligraphic text]; verso u.c. in red ink: [inscription in central cartouche]
